tool.name: Molecules to Fingerprints
tool.command:
#set $fptype = $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector
#if $fptype in ['--FP2', '--FP3', '--FP4', '--MACCS']: ## Open Babel fingerprints ob2fps $fptype --in "${infile.ext}" "${infile}" -o "${outfile}" #else: ## RDKit fingerprints rdkit2fps --in "${infile.ext}" "${infile}" -o "${outfile}" #if $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector == "--RDK": --RDK --fpSize $fp_opts.fpSize --minPath $fp_opts.minPath --maxPath $fp_opts.maxPath --nBitsPerHash $fp_opts.nBitsPerHash $fp_opts.useHs #elif $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector == "--torsions": --torsions --fpSize $fp_opts.fpSize --targetSize $fp_opts.targetSize #elif $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector == "--morgan": --morgan --fpSize $fp_opts.fpSize --radius $fp_opts.radius $fp_opts.useFeatures $fp_opts.useChirality $fp_opts.useBondTypes #elif $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector == "--pairs": --paris --fpSize $fp_opts.fpSize --minLength $fp_opts.minLength --maxLength $fp_opts.maxLength #elif $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector == "--maccs166": --maccs166 #elif $fp_opts.fp_opts_selector == "--substruct": --substruct #end if #end if --errors report 2>&1

param.name: fpSize
param.label: number of bits in the fingerprint

param.name: minPath
param.label: minimum number of bonds to include in the subgraph

param.name: maxPath
param.label: maximum number of bonds to include in the subgraph

param.name: nBitsPerHash
param.label: number of bits to set per path

param.name: useHs
param.label: include information about the number of hydrogens on each atom

param.name: fpSize
param.label: number of bits in the fingerprint

param.name: targetSize
param.label: number of target bits in the fingerprint

param.name: fpSize
param.label: number of bits in the fingerprint

param.name: useFeatures
param.label: include information about the number of hydrogens on each atom

param.name: useChirality
param.label: include information about the number of hydrogens on each atom

param.name: useBondTypes
param.label: include information about the number of hydrogens on each atom

param.name: fpSize
param.label: number of bits in the fingerprint

param.name: minLength
param.label: minimum bond count for a pair

param.name: maxLength
param.label: maximum bond count for a pair

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
This tool uses chemfp_ to calculate 10 different fingerprints of common file formats. Chemfp uses `Open Babel`_, OpenEye_ and RDKit_.
For more information check the websites listed below::
- http://code.google.com/p/rdkit/wiki/FingerprintsInTheRDKit - http://openbabel.org/wiki/Tutorial:Fingerprints
-----
.. class:: infomark
